name: MAZA
body:
### MAZA



### Authors and Contributors
MAZA is a cryptocurrency derived from Bitcoin. 
Currently maintained by @owlhooter @guruvan @kefkius @sensorii

Website maintenance by @BananaLotus @Sterling2p @guruvan
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributorâ€™s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Please join us in #maza on Freenode IRC for help, support, or to see how you can help develop MAZA. Website contributions are always welcome see CONTIRBUTORS this the [mazacoin.org website repo](https://github.com/mazacoin/mazacoin.org)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
